content: knitted top with raglan and short sleeves in drops safran the piece is worked top down with lace pattern sizes xs - xxl drops design pattern no e-306 yarn group a **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops safran from garnstudio 250-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 18 off white **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch
